      Tries to enable wifi by turning on the wifi adapter.

    • Method Detail

      • startMeasuring

        void startMeasuring()
        Starts a scan.

      • stopMeasuring

        void stopMeasuring()
        Stops an ongoing scan

      • isMeasuring

        boolean isMeasuring()
        Returns:
        Is a measurement in progress

      • getLastMeasurement

        WifiMeasurement getLastMeasurement()
        Returns:
        The last measurement. null if no measurement has been taken yet or since stopMeasuring(). The scanning will be stopped (i.e., make sure you call stopMeasuring internally)

      • enableWifi

        boolean enableWifi()
        Tries to enable wifi by turning on the wifi adapter.
        Returns:
        Reports on the success of trying to turn on the wifi adapter.

      • isWifiEnabled

        boolean isWifiEnabled()
        Returns:
        Reports whether wifi is enabled.
